alert.note: Alert for Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Big Horn, Powder River, southern Rosebud and northeastern Sheridan Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ashland to 28 miles southeast of Lame Deer to 25 miles northeast of Sheridan to 6 miles northeast of Ranchester. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Broadus around 750 PM MDT. Biddle around 755 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Olive, Tongue River Reservoir, Otter, Sonnette, Moorhead, Birney, Birney Village and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Tongue River Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
